paper.title: Forecasting cryptocurrency returns with machine learning
paper.abstract: This article employs machine learning models to predict returns for 3703 cryptocurrencies for the 2013 - 2021 period. Based on daily data, we build an equal (capital)-weighted portfolio that generates 7.1 % (2.4 %) daily return with a 1.95 (0.27) Sharpe ratio. We obtain an out-of-sample R2 of 4.855 %. Our results suggest that cryptocurrencies behave like conventional assets than fiat currencies since variables, including lagged returns, can predict future returns. As assets, cryp-tocurrencies are not weakly efficient, and production costs do not determine their prices. Returns for small cryptocurrencies are more predictable than larger ones. The predictive power of the 1 -day lagged return is stronger than all other features (predictors) combined. The results offer new insights for crypto investors, traders, and financial analysts.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是使用机器学习模型预测加密货币的回报，并基于这些预测构建了一个等权重投资组合。这直接涉及投资组合管理的领域，因为研究的主要目标是优化投资组合的回报和夏普比率。
